title: Britannia: a bridge
creator_credit: David Lochner, John Shearman, British Transport Films and Visionaire Productions
brief_description: Menai Strait was completely gutted by fire in 1970. The reconstruction work included steel arches over the seaway and the use of the masonry piers which were a major feature of the original bridge
creator_credit_for_label: David Lochner, John Shearman, British Transport Films and Visionaire Productions
